ui_modal_installationpath_error_title: Wrong Installation Path registered in Windows
ui_modal_installationpath_error_body:
It looks like the program files of Wallpaper Engine have been moved after the installation. This breaks the auto start function and causes a number of problems.

You are currently running Wallpaper Engine from {{runPath}} but {{{Platform}}} has installed Wallpaper Engine to {{steamPath}}. The auto start needs to be updated to use {{{Platform}}}'s correct installation path or this message will continue to appear.

Fix this now?
ui_browse_advertise_explore: Click here to discover new wallpapers from the {{{Host}}}!
ui_browse_advertise_workshop: Click here to search the {{{Host}}} in detail!
ui_browse_no_service_body_use_backup: Wallpaper Engine will now try to show an emergency backup until the company of {{{PLATFORM}}} ({{{PROVIDER}}}) has sorted out their issues.
ui_browse_steam_offline_notice: {{{PLATFORM}}} {{{Host}}} servers are OFFLINE. You are browsing an emergency backup from {{date}}. Please wait a few hours for the company of {{{PLATFORM}}} ({{{PROVIDER}}}) to fix the {{{PLATFORM}}} {{{Host}}} servers again.
ui_browse_offline_error: {{{PLATFORM}}} servers are OFFLINE. Please wait for {{{PROVIDER}}} to fix {{{PLATFORM}}}.
ui_browse_details_properties_reset_promp: Do you want to reset the current properties back to their defaults?
ui_browse_details_properties_preset_hint:
A {{{Host}}} preset includes all of your custom wallpaper settings and any images or videos you may have imported into the wallpaper.

You can publish them on the {{{Platform}}} {{{Host}}} just like regular wallpapers, allowing other users to experience the look and feel with the settings you have created. You can also download presets which other users have shared.
ui_browse_details_properties_apply_to_al: Apply to all Wallpapers and set Default Settings
Changes the default settings for all wallpapers on your current monitors or only changes these settings for the selected wallpapers.
Update all wallpapers and default settings
ui_browse_modal_remove_preset_info: The following presets are depending on the wallpaper(s) you are trying to unsubscribe and will be removed as well: {{presets}}
ui_browse_modal_subscribe_preset_body:
The wallpaper {{title}} is a preset for another wallpaper which you need to subscribe to as well to use it.

Subscribe to both now?
ui_browse_open_url_hotkey_info: To use your keyboard on the wallpaper, hide the icons with this hotkey first:
ui_browse_preset_modal_save_description: If a preset with the same name exists already, it will be overwritten.
ui_browse_preset_modal_empty: You have not created any presets for this wallpaper yet.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_copyrigh: Please use {{{PROVIDER}}}'s DMCA form to submit copyright violations, this will make sure it is dealt with in the legally correct manner.
ui_settings_hotkeys_example:
Hotkeys must contain Ctrl, Shift, Alt. Examples:

Shift + Ctrl + B
Shift + F1

A red border means that your hotkey is not valid.
ui_settings_adjust_windows_color_warning:
IMPORTANT: Please be aware that enabling this feature will modify the look and feel of your Windows. Wallpaper Engine is not able to revert back to your current theme. If you wish to revert to your old design, you need to manually change your Windows Theme color settings.

If you don't know how to do that or if you use an unactivated version of Windows that doesn't allow you to do that, please DO NOT enable this feature!

The colors cannot be reverted by Wallpaper Engine. They can be reverted in the Windows settings instead.
ui_editor_review_info_body: Your wallpaper will be reviewed before other users can find and download it to ensure that it doesn't violate any local laws.If you update your wallpaper, it has to be reviewed again and is pushed to the back of the queue.
ui_editor_importer_gif_warning_body:
The GIF you are trying to import occupies a lot of memory when converted into a more usable format. Wallpaper Engine can try to convert it anyway, but the process might fail with an error.

The GIF format is generally unsuitable for high resolution images and/or a lot of frames, you should consider using an .mp4 video wallpaper because that would perform better.
ui_editor_user_properties_select_info: Choose a property with a compatible type ({{types}}).
ui_editor_user_properties_select_unused_: This property is not being used by the wallpaper.
ui_editor_user_properties_combo_value: Selected combo value for this link:
ui_editor_workshop_rules_modal_body: Before submitting your wallpaper to {{{Host}}}, make sure that it does not violate the {{{Platform}}} Terms of Service, otherwise it will be removed:
ui_editor_effects_modal_compatibility_wa:
You are about to import an effect with a newer version than used by this project. This may result in all instances of this effect being reset and you will lose their settings.

This is not reversible and your old settings will be lost. You may want to make a backup of the project before proceeding.

Do you want to continue?
ui_editor_script_unsaved_changes_body: There are unsaved changes. Do you want to keep them?
